data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Alaska, United States to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Alaska, United States

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 193,742 believers in Alaska, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.section_summary: On average, 52 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Alaska, United States.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, defend the church in the state of Alaska against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: Father, multiply brothers, sisters, and mothers to our spiritual family in Alaska, United States.
data.verse: He replied to him, “Who is my mother, and who are my brothers?” Pointing to his disciples, he said, “Here are my mother and my brothers. For whoever does the will of my Father in heaven is my brother and sister and mother.”

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Turk people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Spirit, please defend the 193,742 believers in Alaska against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Alaska, United States.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.section_summary:
the state of Alaska, United States has a population of 733,700.

We estimate Alaska has 193,742 people who might know Jesus, 367,471 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 172,486 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Alaska, United States a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”
